articles.description: Olivier Giroud made history on Sunday by taking the title of France's all-time top goalscorer by finding the net against Poland in the last-16 at the World Cup.

Olivier Giroud made history on Sunday by taking the title of France's all-time top goalscorer by finding the net against Poland at the World Cup.
